name: FingerBang! Pew Pew Pew
description:
An Online Free For All Deathmatch game where your fingers are your gun! The setting is on a moon with low gravity and SPACE!. Shoot everyone else to become the victor!

The Game however, is slightly broken, and by slightly broken I mean fairly broken, but you can still shoot things and kill each other and jump around and stuff. Lots of things decided to break on the last day so it was a scramble. Hope yall enjoy nonetheless, was a stressful but fun jam!
